title: Rushing 30, anyone else that is leveling and not a bot, come and spam Co - Ops with me :)
body: Playing a bunch of Co Op games to rush level 30 with boosts. Come and play with me and level fast!

replies.body: I can kinda but my time varies a ton. I've reduced myself to Co Ops since I have other passions so yeah, add me and if I have time I'll definitely Co Op
Thanks, are you online at the moment?
